messages.content:
Now at the greatest shift manager in USA, I want you to figure out the schedule of 2-4 tour guides per booth per business and their pay per day if we had 20 booths 

Now start over but eliminate adding a retreat but everyone is an independent contractor and everyone pools half of saturdays half day pay together for charity and all of sundays half day pay for charity every week 
We are working 7 days a week
With the option of tour guides working 5 days per week

Tickets are less than $1000 each
With the average Travel booking which is $300+ per passenger for the flights, and $300-400 per room per night for 2 weeks, with the private tours booked, the activities booked with meals and car rental and extras
With 10-50 guests per group per booth per shift per day
With 1 tour guide manager and 1 tour guide per booth per shift or per booth day per business spot

I want to make $1m profit after paying my expenses and tour guides commissions
I want each tour guide making at least 10% commission from the ticket and making at least $100 per hour for entertaining the group and paying the limo rides at $150 per hour for 1-2 hours per day x 2 days per week and paying 20-25% of the profit to the business for having the booth space and paying off the expenses of the goodies that might be $200-250 per guest per group 

Thats 2 tour guides per shift 10am till 10 pm per booth
With giving the business with the booth or office space at 20-25% cut from the net revenue off the group booking and for each tour guide involved with that group 10% commission and my cut being what remains after paying the expenses of those and the limo trips of $100-150 per hour with at least 1-2 hours per day with giving them 2 days of limo time per week as well as paying the tour guides $100+ per hour for either working as an independent contractor for 4-8 hours plus the photographer at $50 per hour and paying the 2 tour guide managers 10% cut from net revenue

I want to know how many booths of tour guides we would need and for how long and how many groups booked and how many tours per group per booth per spot to make $10m per year?
If all we had was the 
Las Vegas Strip Tour with The Las Vegas Music History Tour 
The Finance Mastery Tour N Wealth Workshop Retreat with The Motivated Guest Tour 

How can we make this the most successful private entertainment tour campaign in Las Vegas where we have continuous flow of groups every day with enough booths and enough tour guides available using critical thinking and game theory?

I want also for the chief financia
finish your sentence but we want 50 guests per shift per tour guide per booth
